channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kaitangata Twitch
channel.desc: A thrilling drama from Margaret Mahy. The island of Kaitangata is twitching, it's waking up! Only 13 year old Meredith can stop it. Can she discover what it wants before it is too late? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Howard Lovecraft and the Frozen Kingdom
channel.desc: PREMIERE: After opening the Necronomicon at his father's sanitarium, young Howard is transported into a frozen, otherworldly realm teeming with Lovecraftian horrors. There, he befriends a creature named Spot and must navigate perilous environments to find his way home.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Black Bear
channel.desc: Starring Aubrey Plaza. A filmmaker at a creative impasse seeks solace from her tumultuous past at a rural retreat, only to find that the woods summon her inner demons in intense and surprising ways. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mahi Pai
channel.desc: It's the third rock from the Sun and the Aorangi we live on, with the help of Ihi learn more about Te Ao. (R).

channel.title: He Rourou
channel.desc: An instructional cooking series aimed at tamariki and wh?nau. (R).

channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.desc: Tired of this weird game, Josh decides it's time to go home but is soon running for his life from creatures emerging from a strange bone-lined fort. (R).

channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. The kids prank Grace to leave their farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fly My Pepeha
channel.desc: Tamariki series offering an immersive journey into the heart of the rich landscapes of Aotearoa and M?ori history. Using drone technology, viewers will explore diverse landscapes and traditions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Molly Of Denali
channel.desc: NEW: The daily adventures of 10-year-old Alaska native Molly Mabray, her family, her dog Suki and her friends Tooey and Trini.

channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Tuarua o Aotearoa 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Frontier
channel.desc: The scars of systematic ethnic cleansing of native peoples along with US claims on land stretching the span of the entire continent, seemingly ends 'the frontier' chapter in American history. (R).

channel.title: Day One Shorts 2024
channel.desc: A queer relationship falls out of sync as one woman loses touch with what is real and what may or may not be coming to her from the divine. (R).

channel.title: The Dark Horse
channel.desc: A brilliant but troubled New Zealand chess champion finds purpose by teaching underprivileged children about the rules of chess and life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: The girls arrive home but the village is eerily quiet. Wai is uneasy and sends Mihi to the eel rack. Mihi stumbles upon Kuia, who has collapsed in the middle of the path. Kuia and Mihi have an emotional goodbye. Elsewhere, Wai is horrified by what she finds in the wharekai. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai is grief-stricken in the wharekai before she remembers Mihi and Ngaru. Wai and Mihi andNgaru are ushered by the spirits into the forest. From there they will never forget their home, and as their people have always done, they too will carry on... (R).

channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: While Kura, Josh and Kazumi follow a trail of maero footprints, Rangi is playing games with rangatira o patupaiarehe on top of the misty maunga. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery

channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hoiho Riding On
channel.desc: A great horse adventure across Aotearoa, meeting our amazing horses and riders of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: The Matau Bros reunite and head out from Great Barrier in search of monster T?mure; In Ohakune, Harry Clarke takes out keen novice shooter Bonnie. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. The Hautut? Hunters travel to Whakatane to see what Te Kohe's Uncle has instore for them. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short, sharp comedy skits from a distinctly M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: Combining his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting, All Black Piri Weepu sets out on a tour around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to T?maki Makaurau to uncover the story behind how Rangitoto was carried from the West Coast of T?maki to the Te Waitemat? Harbour. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: NEW: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamaiti T? Spring
channel.desc: NEW: Kennels get a makeover. The whanau leaves the awa to sweep, hose, and clean the dog boxes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: P?kana 2024
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Thailand's Wild Side
channel.desc: In rainforests, wetlands and bustling cities, Thailand's wild animals fight a deadly battle to find prey or avoid becoming prey. Survival depends on their cleverness, cunning and ingenuity. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Celebrating M?ori hunter-gatherers from all around Aotearoa. Shannon Neho heads to Motu K?kako hoping to catch a Kingfish; Korey and his whanau are out in Mangamaunu for a pig hunt. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: The team struggles to find their first win, and player Sam Parkes helps the community fight against obesity. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Heritage Rescue
channel.desc: Brigid Gallagher travels NZ to visit a different heritage site each episode. Along with her team, Brigid gets the exhibition organised, creating new exhibits and uncovering fascinating stories. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Ten iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Profiles kura kapa haka from across Aotearoa, showcasing the dynamic skills of our future haka exponents.

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using r?kau, p?kura (short sticks) and t?t?t?rea (long sticks). (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Whanganui-born Chef Peter Gordon is known for pioneering fusion cuisine. He passionately connects food and our communities. He shares his vision for the future of food in Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Alfriston reflects on the realities of being M?ori in a mainstream school, confronting identity, inclusion, and belonging issues. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: A raw and honest performance that speaks to the M?ori experience in mainstream spaces - Alfriston makes their mark with strenght and authenticity. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Actor Antonio Te Maioha discusses his work as an actor and his many projects. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: NEW: Drew heads to a Mohawk First Nation on Lake Ontario that hosts one of the largest Tattoo Gatherings in Canada. There he meets dozens of native artists making their cultural marks. Then he goes on traditional indigenous hairstyle journey.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: First Weapons
channel.desc: NEW: Phil Breslin meets weapon makers and science experts, lifting the lid on the genius of Australia's oldest and most innovative weapons.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K?inga Whenua
channel.desc: Capturing the critical moments of building, developing and living on your tupuna whenua. The Panapa whanau show Pio around Te Mahurehure urban marae. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).
